review.text: Marking its territory in the mind-boggling middle ground between Schindler's List and Beverly Hills Chihuahua , the cartoonish kid pic Hotel for Dogs — adapted from the award-winning 1971 children's book — turns out to be a weirdly oblivious Holocaust parable about a sibling duo of righteous dog- ophiles (Emma Roberts and Jake T. Austin) bent on rescuing strays from systematic execution at the hands of Gestapo-like dog catchers. But don't worry. There are still cuddly pups and piddle jokes aplenty. Câ€“
